name: GREENLANDER
description:
Greenlander is a brutal top-down action game, set in Greenland during the 1500's. You play as a nameless Norse settler on a bloody quest for revenge against the Sea Pirates that destroyed your home. Dodge arrows, slam enemies into walls with your shield, and stomp enemy's heads.

Features
  • Fast paced, challenging combat
  • Gloomy, detailed environments
Development

Greenlander is currently in active development. If you're interested in the game, you can follow me on Twitter @russell_castell

Feedback/Bugs

If you encounter bugs or have some feedback you'd like to share, feel free to post a comment or email me at: greenlandergame@gmail.com
